description:
Body Language Decoded [Mens Guide to Non Verbal Signals]

In this course you will learn about the non verbal communication from an expert dating and bodylanguage coach.

You will learn to pick up on, and have better control of sub-contexts, emotional progression on dates, eye contact, body language, and many more nuances that are present and important, but not directly discussed or focused on.
title: Body Language Decoded. [Mens Guide to Non Verbal Signals]
